name: football-logos-quiz

scripts.deploy:frontend:prod: cd frontend && eas update --auto --message "Triggered manually from local environment"
scripts.diff:backend:dev: DEPLOY_ENV=dev cd backend && npm run build && cd cdk && npx cdk diff
scripts.diff:backend:prod: DEPLOY_ENV=prod cd backend && npm run build && cd cdk && npx cdk diff
scripts.deploy:backend:dev: DEPLOY_ENV=dev cd backend && npm run build && cd cdk && npx cdk deploy
scripts.seed:db:prod: ENV=prod cd backend/scripts/data && npx ts-node addLogosToDynamoDB.ts
scripts.seed:db:dev: ENV=dev cd backend/scripts/data && npx ts-node addLogosToDynamoDB.ts

author: Kiriakos Papachristou
description: A mobile quiz app with football logos
